a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: MDG2.A: Net enrollment rate in primary education, 1991 to 2015
Share of children of the relevant age enrolled in primary education. Millennium Development Goal (MDG) 2.A was to
achieve universal primary education by 2015. This MDG Target was not met.
Data source: MDG Final Evaluation (UN MDG Report)
